topic.title: Can somebody give me 1 NameCoin?
topic.body:
Hi, I want to test the namecoin system, but I don't have namecoins. I had zetacoins but I lost the wallet.
A few months ago I downloaded the namecoin blockchain, but I thought the project was discontinued. I thought it was hard to implement if you needed to download a 20GB blockchain in order to navigate.

But I found out that Opennic somehow resolves .bit domains, and Zero uses .bit domains too.

So I kindly ask for a Namecoin to test it. My account is NBD5KqxDXYAwCtZe3CsVmJYWvKZfozPuuG
I'm still 66 weeks behind in this computer, but anyways I would appreciate a donation.

8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Is there a way to have a contact list?
